page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT IN PETROCKSTOWE
page.content: There is virtually{no unemployment}in {Petrockstowe,}with 39% employed, 33% self-employed (including farmers) and 21% retired. The missing 8% includes one unemployed person. Although it is generally believed that a large pro- portion of "outsiders" retire to Devon 60% of the retired here are Devonians born and bred, most of them farmers or farm workers. There is no employer in{Petrockstowe except farmers, and{employment}is mostly found in{Bideford & Torrington, where are respectively North Devon Meat and the Milk Marketing Board, both important employers to this area. Closer to the village, but just out- side the surveyed area, are the clay works at{Peters Marland}and{Meeth, which between them account for 20% of local employment. A similar proportion . continues...
